statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, status FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount AS amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, status FROM insurance_claims WHERE status IN ('approved', 'pending') ORDER BY status ASC, claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id = 101 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'Approved' AND claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, status FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY status HAVING avg_claim_amount > 2000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM policy_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_amount FROM policy_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE policy_id = 12345 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM policy_payments GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_payments > 10000;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS highest_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS average_payment FROM policy_payments GROUP BY policy_id ORDER BY average_payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id,claim_type,claim_status FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE claim_status='Approved';
SELECT policy_holder_id,first_name,last_name,email,phone_number FROM policy_holder WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT policy_id,policy_holder_id,policy_type,policy_end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type='Life Insurance';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE claim_type='Medical' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE claim_status='Pending';
SELECT policy_holder.first_name, insurance_claim_data.claim_type FROM policy_holder INNER JOIN insurance_claim_data ON policy_holder.policy_holder_id = insurance_claim_data.policy_holder_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type='Car' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;

SELECT policy_holder.first_name, insurance_policies.policy_type, insurance_claim_data.claim_type FROM policy_holder INNER JOIN insurance_policies ON policy_holder.policy_holder_id = insurance_policies.policy_holder_id INNER JOIN insurance_claim_data ON insurance_policies.policy_holder_id = insurance_claim_data.policy_holder_id WHERE insurance_claim_data.claim_status='Approved';
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT customer_id, claim_description, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_name, coverage_amount FROM Policies ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT claim_description, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim
SELECT claimant_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claim
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE insurer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE policy_id = 'a361a7ad-85cb-4d21-8414-2da0f3900e7b' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE insurer_id = '3c6e5183-4c12-4843-8c4f-d5f35179f1c4' AND claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT claimant_name FROM insurance_claim WHERE insurer_id = '80ed37df-6a85-4d9b-afc9-7d12729f1b47'
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC, claim_date DESC LIMIT 5
